jade.webservice.dynamicClient
Class DynamicClientCache

java.lang.Object
  jade.webservice.dynamicClient.DynamicClientCache

public class DynamicClientCache
extends java.lang.Object

Singleton and thread-safe cache manager of DynamicClients.
Allows the use and reuse of the DynamicClient without worrying their initialization.

A typical example of use is:

DynamicClientCache dcc = DynamicClientCache.getInstance();
DynamicClient dc = dcc.get(new URI("http://myWSDL"));
……
WSData wsOutputData = dc.invoke(“sum”, wsInputData);

See Also:
DynamicClient

getInstance

public static final DynamicClientCache getInstance()
Get a instance of DynamicClientCache (Singleton thread-safe)

Returns:
a instance of DynamicClientCache

get

public DynamicClient get(java.net.URI wsdl)
                  throws DynamicClientException
Get a initialized DynamicClient for specified wsdl uri.
If the wsdl is alredy present in cache reuse it, otherwise initialize and cache it.
This operation is thread-safe.

Parameters:
wsdl - webservice wsdl uri
Returns:
initialized DynamicClient
Throws:
DynamicClientException

This operation is thread-safe.
